
{{alias}}
    Windows path delimiter.

    Examples
    --------
    > var delimiter = {{alias}}
    ';'
    > var PATH = 'C:\\Windows\\system32;C:\\Windows;C:\\Program Files\\node\\';
    > var paths = PATH.split( {{alias}} )
    [ 'C:\\Windows\\system32', 'C:\\Windows', 'C:\\Program Files\\node\\' ]

    See Also
    --------
